title: I Got Reincarnated as a Weed - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Slice of Life   Xianxia
tags: Androgynous Characters   Beast Companions   Beasts   Cheats   Cultivation   Evolution   Fast Cultivation   Game Elements   Interdimensional Travel   Level System   Loli   Male Protagonist   Monster Society   Reincarnated as an Object   Reincarnated in Another World   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Weak to Strong
author: Low-Key Youth   低调青年
description:
Upon arriving in another world, I found myself become a weed that people casually stepped on.

The system finally activates.

I’ll teach those people the meaning of life, I’m not just some weed they can step on>
